execution_plan.description: Get all order -> customer -> product mappings by joining Orders with Order_Items (order_id, customer_id, product_id).
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.order_id, o.customer_id, oi.product_id FROM Orders o INNER JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve first names for the customers referenced by the orders found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, customer_first_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product names for the product_ids referenced by the order items found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
